extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean[] keys
      Do not read or write to this array.
      static boolean[] keysDown
      Values for all KeyEvent keycodes that are pressed in the current frame

      Values for all KeyEvent keycodes that were pressed 1 frame ago.

      static boolean[] MouseButtons
      0: button 1 1: button 2 3: middle button

      static java.lang.String Typed
      Stores keys typed.
      static boolean Typing
      Set to true to record key presses to "Typed"

      • keys

        public static boolean[] keys
        Do not read or write to this array.

      • keysDown

        public static boolean[] keysDown
        Values for all KeyEvent keycodes that are pressed in the current frame 
         USAGE
         if (keysDown[KeyEvent.VK_W])
  // W is pressed

      • lastKeys

        public static boolean[] lastKeys
         Values for all KeyEvent keycodes that were pressed 1 frame ago.
 Useful for detecting exactly when a key was pressed or released
 
        USAGE
         if (keysDown[KeyEvent.VK_W])
  // W is pressed

      • MouseButtons

        public static boolean[] MouseButtons
         0: button 1
 1: button 2
 3: middle button

 1: button 2
 3: middle button

      • Typing

        Stores keys typed. Set to "" to reset
